text: Leonardo Graziano (born in Capua on 15 November 1975) is an Italian voice actor known for his roles in italiano dubs of anime as Naruto Uzumaki in Naruto, Killua in Hunter Ã— Hunter, Young Franky in One Piece and Dan Kuso in Bakugan. He is also the Italian voice for Sheldon Cooper in The Big Bang Theory. Category:Italian voice actors Category:1975 births Category:Living people
title: Leonardo Graziano
